name: GreenReceipt
description:
Kickstart digital commerce operations with the simplicity of a single plugin. Green Receipt automates everything from catalog creation to launching a powerful WhatsApp DTC channel and onboarding on GBM & other marketplace seller network. 
Unlock powerful WhatsApp Commerce Features via API features without leaving your WhatsApp Business App.
üì≤ Overview
Green Receipt lets you seamlessly use WhatsApp Business API on your existing number ‚Äî while continuing to use your WhatsApp Business App. No more choosing between app or API ‚Äî enjoy both, side by side.
‚öôÔ∏è Key Features
‚Ä¢	API + App Co-existence: Use your WhatsApp Business App and APIs on the same number.
‚Ä¢      Commerce-Ready: Enable end to end commerce on WhatsApp with connected catalogues.
‚Ä¢	Advanced API Capabilities: Enable interactive messages, automated chat flows, bookings, CRM integration, abandoned cart and order notifications.
‚Ä¢	Generate demand through AI-created social media ads that click-to to merchant WhatsApp Business App
focus_areas: Auto Create & maintain digital catalogues and connect to FB, Insta & WhatsApp shopping.
API + App Co-existence: Use your WhatsApp Business App and APIs on the same number.
